about_the_game:
Step into a realm where bullets collide with mystical forces in Prime Agents – an exhilarating first-person shooter that seamlessly integrates the thrill of firearms with the arcane power of spells.

Engage in adrenaline-fueled 5v5 online multiplayer battles, where teamwork and strategy reign supreme. Assemble your squad, choose your weaponry wisely, and plunge into intense skirmishes across a variety of dynamic maps.

Key Features:

1. Dynamic Fusion of Firearms and Magic: Experience an innovative blend of traditional firearms combat and spellcasting mechanics. Arm yourself with a diverse selection of 14 powerful guns, each with its own distinct characteristics, and harness the energy of 5 captivating spells to seize control of the battlefield.

2. Tactical Depth: Success in Prime Agents demands more than just quick reflexes. Develop strategic approaches, coordinate with your team, and adapt to the ever-changing conditions of combat. Manage your resources judiciously – including mana for spells and currency for equipment – to outmaneuver your adversaries and emerge victorious.

3. Heart-Pounding Gameplay: Immerse yourself in high-octane matches that keep you on the edge of your seat. With a focus on the classic Team Deathmatch mode, every encounter is a test of skill and cunning. Stay alert, communicate with your teammates, and dominate the opposition as you strive for supremacy.

4. Constant Evolution: Prime Agents is still in its alpha phase, with exciting updates and additions on the horizon. As we gather feedback from our dedicated player base, we'll be introducing new maps, spells, and guns to further enhance your gaming experience. Join us on this journey of exploration and discovery as we shape the future of the game together.

Prepare yourself for an unparalleled blend of action, strategy, and magic. Are you ready to unleash the power of Prime Agents?
detailed_description:
Step into a realm where bullets collide with mystical forces in Prime Agents – an exhilarating first-person shooter that seamlessly integrates the thrill of firearms with the arcane power of spells.

Engage in adrenaline-fueled 5v5 online multiplayer battles, where teamwork and strategy reign supreme. Assemble your squad, choose your weaponry wisely, and plunge into intense skirmishes across a variety of dynamic maps.

Key Features:

1. Dynamic Fusion of Firearms and Magic: Experience an innovative blend of traditional firearms combat and spellcasting mechanics. Arm yourself with a diverse selection of 14 powerful guns, each with its own distinct characteristics, and harness the energy of 5 captivating spells to seize control of the battlefield.

2. Tactical Depth: Success in Prime Agents demands more than just quick reflexes. Develop strategic approaches, coordinate with your team, and adapt to the ever-changing conditions of combat. Manage your resources judiciously – including mana for spells and currency for equipment – to outmaneuver your adversaries and emerge victorious.

3. Heart-Pounding Gameplay: Immerse yourself in high-octane matches that keep you on the edge of your seat. With a focus on the classic Team Deathmatch mode, every encounter is a test of skill and cunning. Stay alert, communicate with your teammates, and dominate the opposition as you strive for supremacy.

4. Constant Evolution: Prime Agents is still in its alpha phase, with exciting updates and additions on the horizon. As we gather feedback from our dedicated player base, we'll be introducing new maps, spells, and guns to further enhance your gaming experience. Join us on this journey of exploration and discovery as we shape the future of the game together.

Prepare yourself for an unparalleled blend of action, strategy, and magic. Are you ready to unleash the power of Prime Agents?

name: Prime Agents

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: A first person shooter entangled with magic.
